1 #include "../include/ladybug2/publishSplitLadybug.h"
2 
7 int main(int argc, char **argv)
8 {
9  // initialize ROS
10  ros::init(argc, argv, "split_ladybug_node");
11  ros::NodeHandle n;
12 
13  // private node for reading parameters
14  ros::NodeHandle privateNode("~");
15  privateNode.param("color", paramColor, bool(false));
16  privateNode.param("camera_topic", paramCameraTopic, std::string(""));
17  privateNode.param("yaml_path", paramYamlPath, std::string(""));
18 
19  image_transport::ImageTransport it(n);
20 
21  // for each camera...
22  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
23  {
24  // build camera info topic (except the header, which is always changing)
25  char yamlFilename[20];
26  sprintf(yamlFilename, "cam%d.yaml", CAMERA_POSITIONS[i]);
27  std::string yamlFilename_str(yamlFilename);
28  camInfos[i] = getCameraInfo(paramYamlPath + yamlFilename_str);
29 
30  // initialize camera info publishers
31  char infoTopic[100];
32  sprintf(infoTopic, "/ladybug/%d/camera_info", CAMERA_POSITIONS[i]);
33  std::string infoTopic_str(infoTopic);
34  pub_info[i] = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::CameraInfo>(infoTopic_str, 1);
35 
36  // initialize image publishers
37  char camTopic[100];
38  sprintf(camTopic, "/ladybug/%d/image_raw", i);
39  std::string camTopic_str(camTopic);
40  pub_cams[i] = it.advertise(camTopic_str, 1);
41  }
42 
43  // subscribe to Ladybug image topic
44  image_transport::Subscriber sub = it.subscribe(paramCameraTopic, 1, ladybugCallback);
45 
46  ros::spin();
47  return 0;
48 }
49 
53 void ladybugCallback(const sensor_msgs::Image::ConstPtr &msg)
54 {
55  // convert image message to cv::Mat
56  cv::Mat_<uint8_t> full_raw_img = cv::Mat_<uint8_t>(NUM_CAMERAS*IMAGE_WIDTH, IMAGE_HEIGHT, const_cast<uint8_t*>(&msg->data[0]), msg->step);
57 
58  std::string colorCode;
59  if(paramColor)
60  {
61  colorCode = COLOR;
62  }
63  else
64  {
65  colorCode = MONO;
66  }
67 
68  // split Ladybug image
69  std::vector<cv::Mat> splitImages = splitLadybug(full_raw_img, colorCode);
70 
71  // for each camera...
72  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
73  {
74  cv::Mat im = splitImages[i];
75 
76  // resize image to half if specified
77  if(paramResizeHalf)
78  {
79  cv::resize(im, im, cv::Size(IMAGE_WIDTH/2, IMAGE_HEIGHT/2));
80  }
81 
82  // update header of both image and camera info messages
83  std_msgs::Header header(msg->header);
84  char frameId[50];
85  sprintf(frameId, "ladybug_cam_%d", i);
86  header.frame_id = std::string(frameId);
87  camInfos[i].header = header;
88 
89  // convert cv::Mat to image message
90  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr camMsg = cv_bridge::CvImage(header, colorCode, im).toImageMsg();
91 
92  // publish image and camera info
93  pub_cams[i].publish(camMsg);
94  pub_info[i].publish(camInfos[i]);
95  }
96 }
97 
101 sensor_msgs::CameraInfo getCameraInfo(std::string yamlPath)
102 {
103  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo camInfoMsg;
104 
105  // read calibration file
106  std::ifstream yaml(yamlPath);
107  std::string word;
108  while(yaml.good())
109  {
110  yaml >> word;
111 
112  // assign read values to camera info members
113  if(word == "image_width:")
114  {
115  yaml >> word;
116  camInfoMsg.width = atoi(word.c_str());
117  }
118  else if(word == "image_height:")
119  {
120  yaml >> word;
121  camInfoMsg.height = atoi(word.c_str());
122  }
123  else if(word == "camera_matrix:")
124  {
125  for(int i=0; i<5; i++)
126  {
127  yaml >> word;
128  }
129  for(int i=0; i<9; i++)
130  {
131  yaml >> word;
132  word.erase(word.size()-1, 1);
133  if(i == 0)
134  {
135  word.erase(0, 1);
136  }
137  camInfoMsg.K[i] = atof(word.c_str());
138  }
139  }
140  else if(word == "distortion_model:")
141  {
142  yaml >> word;
143  camInfoMsg.distortion_model = word;
144  }
145  else if(word == "distortion_coefficients:")
146  {
147  for(int i=0; i<5; i++)
148  {
149  yaml >> word;
150  }
151  for(int i=0; i<5; i++)
152  {
153  yaml >> word;
154  word.erase(word.size()-1, 1);
155  if(i == 0)
156  {
157  word.erase(0, 1);
158  }
159  camInfoMsg.D.push_back(atof(word.c_str()));
160  }
161  }
162  else if(word == "rectification_matrix:")
163  {
164  for(int i=0; i<5; i++)
165  {
166  yaml >> word;
167  }
168  for(int i=0; i<9; i++)
169  {
170  yaml >> word;
171  word.erase(word.size()-1, 1);
172  if(i == 0)
173  {
174  word.erase(0, 1);
175  }
176  camInfoMsg.R[i] = atof(word.c_str());
177  }
178  }
179  else if(word == "projection_matrix:")
180  {
181  for(int i=0; i<5; i++)
182  {
183  yaml >> word;
184  }
185  for(int i=0; i<12; i++)
186  {
187  yaml >> word;
188  word.erase(word.size()-1, 1);
189  if(i == 0)
190  {
191  word.erase(0, 1);
192  }
193  camInfoMsg.P[i] = atof(word.c_str());
194  }
195  }
196  }
197 
198  // assign default values to attributes that are not specified in the calibration file
199  camInfoMsg.binning_x = 0;
200  camInfoMsg.binning_y = 0;
201  camInfoMsg.roi.width = camInfoMsg.width;
202  camInfoMsg.roi.height = camInfoMsg.height;
203  camInfoMsg.roi.x_offset = 0;
204  camInfoMsg.roi.y_offset = 0;
205  camInfoMsg.roi.do_rectify = true;
206 
207  // update parameters for half-resized image
208  if(paramResizeHalf)
209  {
210  camInfoMsg.width *= 0.5;
211  camInfoMsg.height *= 0.5;
212  camInfoMsg.roi.width *= 0.5;
213  camInfoMsg.roi.height *= 0.5;
214  camInfoMsg.K[0] *= 0.5;
215  camInfoMsg.K[2] *= 0.5;
216  camInfoMsg.K[4] *= 0.5;
217  camInfoMsg.K[5] *= 0.5;
218  camInfoMsg.P[0] *= 0.5;
219  camInfoMsg.P[2] *= 0.5;
220  camInfoMsg.P[5] *= 0.5;
221  camInfoMsg.P[6] *= 0.5;
222  }
223 
224  return camInfoMsg;
225 }
